t: Amazon expands own-brand grocery lineup with Aplenty
s: March 25, 2025 - Amazon has added a new food line called Aplenty to its private-brand grocery roster. Sold online and in-store via Amazon Fresh supermarkets, Aplenty at launch includes such items as pita chips, potato chips, crackers, cookies and mustard, Seattle-based Amazon said Monday.

t: The Many, Many Grocery Brands Owned By Amazon
